subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tom Watson, a two-time Masters champion, will take part in the Manhattan Golf Classic, a made-for-television Skins Game on Governors Island on Oct. 22. Watson, who plays on the PGA Champions Tour, will team with the actor Dennis Quaid against the L.P.G.A. players Annika Sorenstam and Natalie Gulbis in the charity event on Manhattan's only golf course.
